text: @realDonaldTrump If you put half as much effort into the coronavirus as this naming issue , your citizens might not be dieing in such numbers.  I suggest you sign an executive order that nothing gets renamed because there should never be a trump street, trump high school or trump library.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
